description: A studio course focusing on the artistic decision-making process of stage direction,
script analysis, directorial concepts, production designs and hands-on directing
experience building on the skills developed in THEAT 232: Stage Direction.
Students direct a one-act play as the final project for the course.  Offered annually in
the spring semester. Prerequisite: THEAT 232 and THEAT 240 or THEAT 250. THEAT 270 or
